The plate serving below shows the proportions between a meals various components required for a well-balanced intake of nutrients.
• Peanuts, nuts and almonds are not allowed in school/kindergarten and are therefore not offered on the menu. Sesame seeds are also not served because of allergies.
• Students/children who for ethical reasons do not eat meat
are offered lactose free vegetable food instead (contains milk products and eggs).
• Do not send students/children with food from home! The
kitchen does not take responsibility for storage and serving of food students/children bring with them from home.
• Report to the kitchen if your child is sick or absent from school. By so doing we avoid making food that ends up being thrown away.
*To ensure that your child receives the correct special menu their name and current menu requirements are recorded in a
